body:
## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [x] New feature

## Description

Adds an option to automatically split large messages in the spam module
Also adds an option to enable uppercase characters with the bypass mode of the spam module

## Related issues

None

# How Has This Been Tested?

Various different module settings tweaked and enabled and no issues found

# Checklist:

- [x] My code follows the style guidelines of this project.
- [x] I have added comments to my code in more complex areas.
- [x] I have tested the code in both development and production environments.
